methods.name: cogroup
methods.signature: global static Wave.QueryNode cogroup(List<Wave.QueryNode> cogroupNodes, List<List<String>> groups)
methods.description: Cogrouping means that two input streams are grouped independently and arranged side by side. Only data that exists in both groups appears in the results.
